[革]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a stretched animal hide: the upper is head, the bottom is the tail and legs. The hands 臼 around the hide were briefly added later.
Compare 皮 ( pí ) , which also features a hide.

[堇]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ) — a person (大) being burned in a sacrificial ceremony ( Li Xueqin, 2012 ) to invoke the rain. At the bottom of the character, a fire (火) is visible. At the top of the character, an open mouth screaming (廿) is visible. Compare 黃 .
